Package controller

Class CustomerView

java.lang.Object
controller.CustomerView
All Implemented Interfaces:
javafx.fxml.Initializable
public class CustomerView extends Object implements javafx.fxml.Initializable
THis class controls the Customer View for the app. In here, you can look through all of the customers, add a customer and update a customer record.

    • onNewCustomerCountryCombo

      public void onNewCustomerCountryCombo(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
      This method loads the new customer first level division box based on the country value selected for the new customer. This was updated with the lambda expression of filtered divisions from the DAO file. This reduces the number of lines and calculations done in the controller here.
      Parameters:
      actionEvent - from the country combo box selection

    • onEditCustomerCountryComboBox

      public void onEditCustomerCountryComboBox(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
      This loads the edit customer division choice box based on the country selected.
      Parameters:
      actionEvent - from the country selection
